mapper.update: update jn_area set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_name = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, area_name, region_name, version, create_time, update_time from jn_area
